com.redhat.rhn.frontend.graphing
Class GraphGenerator

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.frontend.graphing.GraphGenerator

public class GraphGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

GraphGenerator - Generates a graph JPG with the passed in parameters. Places the file in the java.io.tmpdir system property location.

Method Summary

generateGraphFile

public java.io.File generateGraphFile(JFreeChart chartIn,
                                      int height,
                                      int width)
Generate a graph, store it to the java.io.tmpdir and return a java.io.File object pointer to the file itself.

Parameters:
chartIn - chart we want to save as a File
height - height in pixels of the image generated
width - in pixels of the image generated
Returns:
java.io.File representation of the graph

generateJFReeChart

public JFreeChart generateJFReeChart(int height,
                                     int width,
                                     java.lang.String xAxisLabel,
                                     java.lang.String yAxisLabel,
                                     java.util.List timeSeriesData,
                                     java.util.Map labelMap)
Generate a JFreeChart class from specified parameters.

Parameters:
height - height in pixels of the image generated
width - in pixels of the image generated
xAxisLabel - label for the x axis
yAxisLabel - label for the y axis
timeSeriesData - List of TimeSeriesData[] DTO objects
labelMap - a map containing the localized labels used for the metrics. Contains simple "metricId" keys with the localized Strings as the value. For example: labelMap={"pctfree" -> "Percent Free", "memused" -> "Memory Used"}
Returns:
JFreeChart representation
